name: thickening
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the process of becoming thicker or of making something become thicker: This thickening of the airways causes them to narrow and makes it difficult to move air into and out of the lungs.
[ C or U ] a place where something has become thicker: No intestinal wall thickenings were identified.
[ U ] something added to a liquid to make it thicker: Put everything except the thickening in the pot. Synonym
thickener
More examplesFewer examplesThe treatment can cause side effects such as thickening of facial hair.Can you see a thickening or broadening of the tips of your fingers?In flatworms all that exists is a simple network of nerve fibres. There are a few thickenings in some of them, but these can hardly be described as brains.Cornflour is used as thickening.

Additives in food & drinks

becoming thicker: Nothing lay ahead of her except the thickening belts of trees that ringed the head of the valley. Studies have shown that age need not necessarily be entirely to blame for a thickening waist.
